title: Is it possible that the current spread of Covid-19 is directly related to the now-infamous Rose Garden superspread event and Trump continues to spread it? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t think the current upsurge is due to the Rose Garden event but there are other events which led to the spread of the virus in the upper midwest which previously had few cases. The motorcycle rally in South Dakota is probably the biggest event as it involved 500,000 people. Trump’s massive rallies probably come second.

It is not only possible it was a super spreader event. Trump passed it to 28 within his administration. And, each and every event he has held has an increased rate of infection right afterward. He is a killer and ignores it.
